Name: STARVATION & NEGLECT ARE TORTURE! STOP THE DEPORTATIONS! NO MORE INHUMANE DETENTIONS!
Purpose: Maria Valeriano P√©rez, a beloved Ventura County mother of three was forcibly taken by ICE during a routine immigration check-in this week. Detained with other women, she endured horrific conditions: denied showers, clean clothes, and adequate food. A diabetic, Maria was deprived of enough food to safely take her medication, risking her health. Though now deported to Tijuana, the abuse she and others suffered must end.

Name: NDLON Rapid Response Workshop
Purpose: This coming Friday we will have a #rapidresponse workshop, a frontline essential tool for defending our community in this moment of crisis. We hope you can join us on Friday. If you are adopting a corner- we hope to see you there!

Name: How to Handle ICE enforcement at work in this Boyle Heights workshop
Purpose:
In response to growing concerns about immigration enforcement across Los Angeles, the Independent Hospitality Coalition (@ihclaorg) is partnering with the Boyle Heights Chamber of Commerce (@boyleheights_chamber) to host a business readiness workshop aimed at educating businesses on how to protect their staff and customers during potential ICE raids. The free workshop, scheduled for Monday, June 30, in Boyle Heights, will provide vital information on business owners‚Äô legal rights and practical strategies for responding to immigration enforcement in the workplace.

The event will be open to a wide range of business operators, including brick-and-mortar establishments, food trucks and street vendors.

Spanish interpretation will be available.

Name: Join Court Watch LA
Purpose: NLG LA and @jailsupportla are deeply grateful to our partner @courtwatchla in supporting those who have been arrested protesting ICE raids in Los Angeles. Court Watch LA volunteers have been at every court date assisting arrestees & monitoring the criminal cases that have been filed so they we can continue to offer solidarity to protesters who are facing prosecution. If you would like to volunteer with Court Watch LA their next training is July 15th at 6 pm. Register at the link in our bio.
